This website was made with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) and hosted through GitHub pages.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: false

source(here::here("src", "setup.R"), echo = FALSE)
```

The following packages were used in its making:

:::{.callout-tip appearance="simple" collapse="true"}

## Expand for Session Info

```{r}
#| echo: false

# Inspired by: https://themockup.blog/posts/2022-04-18-session-info/

ses_info <- sessioninfo::session_info(pkgs = "attached")

ses_info$platform$quarto <- system("quarto --version", intern = TRUE)

knitr::write_bib(ses_info$packages$package, file = here("res", "software.bib"), prefix = "")

ses_info
```

:::
